title: Make a Bamboo Cooking Container
brief: Create a cooking pot from bamboo by cutting between sealed joints.
steps: Step 1: Find a section of bamboo with sealed joints at both ends.
Step 2: Cut the bamboo between the two sealed joints to create a natural container.
Step 3: Clean out any debris from inside the bamboo section.
Step 4: Fill with food and water for cooking.
Step 5: Add hot rocks to the water to cook food, replacing cooled rocks with newly heated ones.
warnings: Never heat a sealed bamboo section directly - trapped air and water will cause it to explode.
Do not use rocks with air pockets (limestone, sandstone) as they may explode when heated.
Keep the bamboo container moist or keep fire low to prevent burning above waterline.
